entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17 except minus 8 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 17 except minus 8 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
